en: 6 every nominator of candidates for the constituency election commission members shall be entitled to a proportional number of each category of administrative positions in the constituency election commission subject to the provisions of part 1 of this article the share of administrative positions for each nominator of candidates to constituency election commissions within the nationwide constituency shall be determined on the basis of the proportion between the quantity of all selected constituency election commission members who were nominated by that nominator and the total quantity of all selected constituency election commission members a person appointed to a constituency election commission upon the submission of the chairperson of the central election commission may not be appointed to an administrative position in that election commission unless no submissions or less than the required number of submissions from the candidates for the president of ukraine have been made administrative positions shall be distributed between nominators by the central election commission based on the shares determined in accordance with this part of this article such procedures shall provide for approximate evenness of the territorial distribution of the positions received by representatives of every nominator

en: 9 the acceptance of the voting ballots by the precinct election commission shall be carried out at the meeting of the precinct election commission without delay after the election commission members who received the ballots arrive  the secretary of the precinct election commission shall unpack the package of the manufacturer and stamp the seal of the precinct election commission in the designated fields on each voting ballot another member of the precinct election commission designated by the decision of the commission shall count the received voting ballots checking for accuracy the constituency number and election precinct number indicated on the voting ballots during the counting of the voting ballots it shall be prohibited to divide the commission into groups to count portions of all voting ballots if the number of voting ballots and the number indicated in the extract from the statement of the constituency election commission on the transfer of ballots do not match the precinct election commission shall draw up an act in triplicate in the form established by the central election commission indicating the reason for the difference established by the decision of the precinct election commission one copy of the act shall be handed over to the constituency election commission the second shall be kept at the precinct election commission and the third shall be posted for public review at the official information stand of the commission in case of the above discrepancies the number of voting ballots established at the meeting of the precinct election commission and recorded in the act on the discrepancies shall be considered the number of voting ballots received by the precinct election commission

en: 4 the application for registering proxies of the candidate for the president of ukraine in an electronic version and a paper copy signed by the candidate for the president of ukraine shall be submitted to the central election commission at any time after the registration of the candidate by the candidates authorised representative in the central election commission or by the candidate in person in case of such an application being submitted to the central election commission in a paper copy in another way the signature of the candidate for the president of ukraine shall be certified in the manner prescribed by the law of ukraine on the notarial system in case of such an application being submitted by email it shall be certified by affixing a qualified electronic signature of the candidate the application for registration of the proxies of the candidate for the president of ukraine in the central election commission shall include the last name given name all given names patronymic if any of each proxy hisher citizenship day month and year of birth place of work position occupation mailing address contact phone number information on the absence of a conviction for committing a grave or especially grave crime or a criminal misdemeanour against citizens voting rights or a corruption criminal misdemeanour which has not been removed or expunged as provided by law photocopies of the passport of a citizen of ukraine photocopies of the 1st and 2nd pages of the passport of a citizen of ukraine in the form of a passport book or photocopies of the front and back sides of the passport of a citizen of ukraine in the form of an id card or photocopies of the 1st and 2nd pages of the temporary id of the citizen of ukraine for persons recently accepted in the citizenship of ukraine shall be attached to the application
